column1: @entity2 is Thirty years old, and lives in a big house. He is a doctor. @entity2 enjoys his job because he helps sick people get better. He works with another doctor, named @entity1, and with four nurses.  @entity2 had to study hard to become a doctor. He had to go to a special school for seven years. Learning to be a doctor is difficult. Only very smart and hardworking people can become doctors. @entity2 was not sad when he was studying. He enjoyed learning all about why people get sick and how to make them feel better. Now, @entity2 is a very good doctor. Sometimes other doctors ask him questions, because he knows more about some things that they do. @entity0 and Alice are two other doctors who became friends with @entity2. @entity0 is Forty years old, and Alice is Twenty Five years old. Sometimes they all have dinner together, and at other times they listen to music at @entity2's house. In his free time, @entity2 likes to play basketball. @entity2 works hard, and sometimes he wants to have fun. But really, his job is fun to him. When he wakes up in the morning, he always is excited thinking about how he can help people as a doctor.
he knows more about some things than they do.
he knows more about some things than they do.
he is thirty years old, so the other doctors think he is old and wise.
@entity2 works with another doctor, so he has the skills of two people.
they ask him questions about basketball, because he plays it.
